forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 8C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 47F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Becoming windy late. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. High 56F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
